issue.title: Add all VMRC ROS packages to the ROS package repository

content.raw:
Packages ready in shadow-fixed:

* http://packages.ros.org/ros-shadow-fixed/ubuntu/pool/main/r/ros-kinetic-wamv-description/
* http://packages.ros.org/ros-shadow-fixed/ubuntu/pool/main/r/ros-kinetic-vmrc-gazebo/
* http://packages.ros.org/ros-shadow-fixed/ubuntu/pool/main/r/ros-kinetic-wamv-gazebo/
* http://packages.ros.org/ros-shadow-fixed/ubuntu/pool/main/r/ros-kinetic-wamv-description/

In a few days, they will be automatically synced into the main repository.
